p: Human pathogenic bacteria Bacillus subtilis (UBC 344), Staphylococcus aureus (ATCC 25923), and Pseudomonas aeruginosa (ATCC 9027) and human pathogenic fungi Candida albicans (ATCC 90028) were obtained from the Department of Microbiology, Faculty of Medical Sciences, University of Sri Jayewardenepura and Industrial Technology Institute (ITI), Sri Lanka.
